scripts.pkg-linux: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-linux-x64 -o bin/linux/gitlab-ci-local && chmod +x bin/linux/gitlab-ci-local && gzip -c bin/linux/gitlab-ci-local > bin/linux.gz
scripts.pkg-macos: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-macos-x64 -o bin/macos/gitlab-ci-local && gzip -c bin/macos/gitlab-ci-local > bin/macos.gz
scripts.pkg-win: pkg dist/index.js -t node12-win-x64 -o bin/win/gitlab-ci-local && gzip -c bin/win/gitlab-ci-local.exe > bin/win.gz
scripts.pkg-all: npm run pkg-linux && npm run pkg-macos && npm run pkg-win
scripts.check-all: npm run build && npm run --silent lint && npm run ncu && npm audit --parseable
